    Reference

    All functions

    calc_mode()

    Calculate mode

    drug_quantity()

    Return the amount of a drug to be ordered

    forecast_series()

    Make a forecast of drug issues

    get_holidays()

    Get holidays

    inventory_reorder()

    Forecast and run inventory management algorithm, returning reorder quantities by site and drug

    make_quantiles()

    Make quantiles from a forecast

    make_tsibble()

    Make a tsibble suitable for forecsating

    n_weekdays()

    return number of weekdays

    plot_forecast()

    Plot the forecast

    show_accuracy()

    Show the accuracy of a set of forecasts
